attributes.action: Get a skatepark in Holmes Chapel
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to get a skatepark for the youth of holmes chapel. Many are often told to move off of the precinct as we they are in the way or accidently causing damage to property. It's time for change. If we are provided a skatepark it will help to free the precinct of many bike riders, skateboarders etc. It will give the youth of holmes chapel something to do.
